channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I want nice, thin blood pouring through my heart'”: Trump talks health concerns, saying he takes more aspirin than recommended
item.description: “In retrospect, it’s too bad I took it because it gave them a little ammunition,” Trump told The Wall Street Journal about having a scan done.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Saturday, January 3 Clues And Answers (#937)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: The 20 Best Games Of 2025
item.description: Here are the 20 best games of 2025 (at least in one writer's opinion).

item.title: Betty Boop and Blondie join Mickey Mouse and Winnie the Pooh in the public domain
item.description: “It’s a big year,” said Jennifer Jenkins of Duke’s Center for the Study of the Public Domain. “It's just the sheer familiarity of all this culture.”

item.title: Ukraine’s Killer AI Drones Are Back With A Vengeance
item.description: Experimental AI-enabled FPV attack drones were disappointing in 2024, but the second generation are far more capable and are already reaping results.

item.title: ‘The Pitt’ Season 2: Release Date, New Plot, Who Isn’t Returning And More
item.description: Here's everything we know about The Pitt season 2 including its imminent release date, plot, returning and departing cast members and more.

item.title: Farmers see a ‘Band-Aid on a deep wound’ as White House reveals the size of their soybean tariff bailout
item.description: The details arrived after most farmers have already met with their bankers to arrange financing for next year's crops and placed orders.

item.title: Runaway boulder on Indiana Jones set rolls over Disney World worker
item.description: “We’re focused on supporting our cast member, who is recovering," Disney said in a statement.

item.title: Michigan college survey says ‘6-7’ is lowkey cooked, put in on the ‘Banished Words List’
item.description: The Lake Superior State University roundup of overused slang started in 1976 as a New Year’s Eve party idea.

item.title: Widening K-shaped economy pattern across income groups
item.description: Bank of America data reveals a stark K-shaped economy as higher-income Americans spend 2.6% more while lower-income households manage just 0.6% growth...

item.title: Look Out For New State And Federal Legislation On AI
item.description: Policymakers scrutinize AI-driven layoffs, strengthening disclosure laws amid rising political backlash and workforce fears nationwide.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
